data.communities: ML: xmlindex@lists.ifi.lmu.de; svn to be installed
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There is quite a number of modules for indexing unstructured text.
    The best of it being probably plucene. Though, there is no
    technology extension for XML indexing yet. This application intends
    to open this namespace so we can start and implement some very
    promising approaches. Recently (2004) some of my colleagues (Felix
    Weigel, Klaus Schulz et al.) at the Institute of Computational
    Linguistics here at Munich University have developed the so-called
    "Content Aware DataGuide" (**). I plan to implement especially this
    technology under the GPL.

    **:
    http://www.pms.informatik.uni-muenchen.de/publikationen/diplomarbeiten/Felix.Weigel/weigel03cadg.pdf.gz
